original_title: Asami Maki Ballet Tokyo: The Nutcracker
overview: New 2021 version of the classic. One of Tchaikovsky's three major ballets, The Nutcracker, a heartwarming story of Christmas. The Maki Asami Ballet Company started a regular performance of "The Nutcracker" in 1963. And it has been performing for about 60 years until today.
title: Asami Maki Ballet Tokyo: The Nutcracker
